CarouselDisplayItems.captionContent: You can ask whatever you want

CardDisplayitems.title: Natural Language Processing
CardDisplayitems.text: Natural Language Processing is the key to detect what you actually want to ask. It is a process where computers process and analyze large amounts of natural language data.

CardDisplayitems.title: Wikipedia
CardDisplayitems.text: We can also grab things from Wikipedia for those we do not know.

CardDisplayitems.title: A.I.
CardDisplayitems.text: It is very clever and capable of learning new stuff. Don't be surprised at it!
